This extension steps in to simplify the intricate nature of Salesforce debug logs, offering a range of features designed to optimize your experience:

‚ú® Smart Log Interpretation: Gain an improved understanding of the entire running process through intuitive log interpretation.

üîç Effortless Search: Seamlessly locate relevant logs through an advanced search feature that streamlines the process.

üìú Inline JSON Parsing: Simplify JSON comprehension with a one-click inline parsing function.

üìä Efficient SOQL Reading: Enhance reading with a single-click option that facilitates easier comprehension of SOQL queries.

üîÑ Auto Refresh: Enjoy the convenience of an auto-refresh feature that keeps your log list up to date.

üóëÔ∏è Bulk Log Deletion: Streamline management by choosing the bulk log deletion option.

üìå Log Marking: Highlight logs for later reference, aiding in organization and efficiency.

üü¢ Log Line Highlighting: Identify debug lines with green highlights and error/exception lines with red highlights for improved visibility.

üñ•Ô∏è User-Friendly UI: Experience easy-to-read logs, even on your laptop, thanks to an optimized user interface.

‚Ü©Ô∏è Toggle Back: Always revert to the standard log view when needed.

0.2.2
bug fixed where flexipages were not rendered correctly due to the extention being active. now it's not making any mistakes... (sorry for that!)

0.2.1
New easy access button from every page in a salesforce org.
Log Length is now showed and a comment for whether it is supported for SmartLog Display or not. it will automatically open in the regular mode if it does not support SmartLog Display.

bug fixes..
